SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET WHERE 1 = 1
AND MEET_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND MEET_PLACE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND MEET_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND( MEET_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR MEET_PLACE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR MEET_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

SELECT A.MEET_SEQ , A.MEET_NM , A.MEET_PLACE , (SELECT SUM(TARGET_CNT) FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET_DTL WHERE MEET_SEQ = A.MEET_SEQ AND REFUND_YN != 'Y')AS TARGET_CNT , (SELECT SUM(ADULT_CNT) + SUM(ELE_CNT) + SUM(INF_CNT) FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET_DTL WHERE MEET_SEQ = A.MEET_SEQ AND REFUND_YN != 'Y')AS TOTAL_CNT , (SELECT FORMAT(SUM(DES_PLAN_AMT), 0) FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET_DTL WHERE MEET_SEQ = A.MEET_SEQ AND REFUND_YN != 'Y')AS DES_PLAN_AMT , (SELECT FORMAT(SUM(DES_AMT), 0) FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET_DTL WHERE MEET_SEQ = A.MEET_SEQ AND REFUND_YN != 'Y')AS DES_AMT FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET A WHERE 1 = 1
AND MEET_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND MEET_PLACE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND MEET_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
AND( MEET_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR MEET_PLACE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') OR MEET_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%') )

SELECT MEET_DTL_SEQ , MEET_SEQ , NICK , ADULT_CNT , ELE_CNT , INF_CNT , TARGET_CNT , DES_PLAN_AMT , DES_NM , DES_AMT , DES_DATE , DES_YN , REFUND_YN , REFUND_DATE , ETC , UPDDATE FROM TB_ILLUMI_MEET_DTL WHERE MEET_DTL_SEQ = #{MEET_DTL_SEQ}
SELECT CONCAT(DANZI, '단지')AS DANZI , COUNT(HOSU)AS HOSU_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE DANZI = A.DANZI AND WARRANT_YN = 'Y')AS WARRANT_CNT FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO A GROUP BY DANZI

SELECT CONCAT(DONG, '동')AS DANZI , COUNT(HOSU)AS HOSU_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE DONG = A.DONG AND WARRANT_YN = 'Y')AS WARRANT_CNT FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO A WHERE DANZI = #{SCH_TYPE} GROUP BY DONG
SELECT TRUNCATE((TOTAL_CNT * 100) / 3724 , 2)AS TOTAL_AVG , TRUNCATE((TOTAL_CNT * 100) / 3467 , 2)AS TOTAL_AVG2 FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO A WHERE A.WARRANT_YN = 'Y' )T
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AMT_YN_CNT , FORMAT(SUM(AMT), 0 ) AS TOTAL_AMT FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE AMT_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM ILLUMI_ACCT_MSTR

SELECT TB.* FROM( SELECT T.* , CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT ACCT_MSTR_SEQ , DONG , HOSU , ACCT_DATE , DESOL_CONT , CONT , FORMAT(IN_AMT,0)AS IN_AMT , FORMAT(OUT_AMT,0)AS OUT_AMT , FORMAT(AMT,0)AS AMT , ETC1 , ETC2 , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d')AS REGDATE , DATE_FORMAT(UPDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d')AS UPDDATE , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM ILLUMI_ACCT_MSTR ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY ACCT_DATE DESC )T )TB WHERE PAGE = #{CURR_PAGE} ORDER BY ACCT_DATE DESC
SELECT FORMAT(SUM(IN_AMT),0) AS TOTAL_AMT FROM ILLUMI_ACCT_MSTR
